      • onNotificationStateUpdate

        public void onNotificationStateUpdate(@NotNull
                                      @NotNull BluetoothPeripheral peripheral,
                                      @NotNull
                                      @NotNull BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic,
                                      @NotNull
                                      @NotNull GattStatus status)
        Callback invoked when the notification state of a characteristic has changed.

        Use BluetoothPeripheral.isNotifying(BluetoothGattCharacteristic) to get the current notification state of the characteristic

        Parameters:
        peripheral - the peripheral
        characteristic - the characteristic for which the notification state changed
        status - GATT status code

        value - the new value received
        characteristic - the characteristic for which the new value was received
        status - GATT status code

      • onDescriptorWrite

        public void onDescriptorWrite(@NotNull
                              @NotNull BluetoothPeripheral peripheral,
                              @NotNull
                              @NotNull byte[] value,
                              @NotNull
                              @NotNull BluetoothGattDescriptor descriptor,
                              @NotNull
                              @NotNull GattStatus status)
        Callback invoked as the result of a descriptor write operation. This callback is not called for the Client Characteristic Configuration descriptor. Instead the onNotificationStateUpdate(BluetoothPeripheral, BluetoothGattCharacteristic, GattStatus) will be called
        Parameters:
        peripheral - the peripheral
        value - the value that was written
        descriptor - the descriptor written to
        status - the GATT status code

      • onPhyUpdate

        public void onPhyUpdate(@NotNull
                        @NotNull BluetoothPeripheral peripheral,
                        @NotNull
                        @NotNull PhyType txPhy,
                        @NotNull
                        @NotNull PhyType rxPhy,
                        @NotNull
                        @NotNull GattStatus status)
        Callback invoke as result of readPhy or setPhy operation
        Parameters:
        peripheral - the peripheral
        txPhy - the transmitter PHY in use.
        rxPhy - the receiver PHY in use
        status - GATT status code

      • onConnectionUpdated

        public void onConnectionUpdated(@NotNull
                                @NotNull BluetoothPeripheral peripheral,
                                int interval,
                                int latency,
                                int timeout,
                                @NotNull
                                @NotNull GattStatus status)
        Callback invoked when the connection parameters are updated. This can happen as a result of requestConnectionPriority() or when the stack/peripheral decides to change the connection parameters. This callback is only called for Android 8 (Oreo) or newer.
        Parameters:
        peripheral - the peripheral
        interval - Connection interval used on this connection, 1.25ms unit. Valid range is from 6 (7.5ms) to 3200 (4000ms).
        latency - Slave latency for the connection in number of connection events. Valid range is from 0 to 499.
        timeout - Supervision timeout for this connection, in 10ms unit. Valid range is from 10 (0.1s) to 3200 (32s).
        status - GATT status code
